europeana:record.dc:title: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 49. A preliminary review of the Aegithalidae, Remizidae and Paridae
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Eck S.
Martens J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Aves
Paridae
Aegithalidae
Remizidae

systematics
taxonomy

Indo-Malayan region
morphology

secondary contacts
hybridisation;introgression
europeana:record.dc:description: Proposed recent taxonomic changes in Paridae, Aegithalidae, and Remizidae are reviewed within the geographic scope of this series and their reliability is discussed in terms of the Biological Species Concept with respect to secondary contacts, hybridization, introgression, bioacoustics, and molecular genetics. Certain previously unpublished data are added to support the taxonomic decisions.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 49. A preliminary review of the Aegithalidae, Remizidae and Paridae (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 80-5)
